hk.ust.cse.comp4321.proj1.vsm

Class QueryUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • hk.ust.cse.comp4321.proj1.vsm.QueryUtils

  • public class QueryUtils
extends Object
    The QueryUtils class is an utility class that contains utility methods for handling user's query and similarity score calculation between the query and documents to adopt vector space model in the search engine

                                          @NotNull String token)
        Identify if the input token is a special token ("AND", "OR")
        Parameters:
        token - string from the tokenized query
        Returns:
        a string that indicates if the input token is "AND", "OR" or not

      • querySplit

        public static List<List<String>> querySplit(List<String> query,
                                            String delimiter)
        Split the input the query to multiple subqueries
        Parameters:
        query - user's input query
        delimiter - distinguisher between subqueries (such as "AND", "OR")
        Returns:
        a list of lists of strings which stores the subqueies after splitting the input query
